name: DeleteAsanaWebhook
description:
Permanently delete a webhook in Asana.

Use this tool to permanently remove a webhook from Asana. Even after deletion, requests that were in flight may still be received. No further requests will be issued once the webhook is deleted. Ensure you have the required 'webhooks:delete' scope.

parameters.name: webhook_global_id
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the specific webhook to delete in Asana.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the webhook.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: If true, formats the response with line breaks and indentation for readability. Use primarily for debugging as it increases response time and size.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.
